post.description: Authenticates a user based on the provided credentials.

get.description: Returns the data of the currently authenticated user.

post.description: Revokes all tokens from the authenticated user, effectively logging out.

get.summary: Get a paginated list of courses
get.description: Returns a paginated list of courses based on the provided query parameters.
Returns details of a single course based on the provided course ID

put.description: Updates an existing course based on the data provided in the request.

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: ID of the course to update

delete.description: Deletes an existing course based on the provided ID.

parameters.name: courseId
parameters.description: ID of the course to delete

post.description: Creates a new course based on the data provided in the request.

items.example: The course name field is required.

parameters.description: ID of the ebook to update

delete.description: Deletes an existing ebook based on the provided ID.

parameters.description: ID of the ebook to delete

items.example: The course name field is required.
